content:
I added facts about the coherent topology on a precoherent category, which were part of the Copenhagen masterclass.
https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/5695
This is ready for review.
This would be ready for merge. (I am unsure whether I can/should do this myself after one approving review)

Having a look.

Just to explain how the system works: you can merge the PR (ie writing bors merge) after you have been "delegated". In practice this means that a maintainer has written bors d+ (you receive a message saying "you can merge this PR" or something similar). We usually do this when the PR is ready except for some small modifications. We merge it directly if it's 100% ready.
